chapters.title: Chapter 30:  What the Oath Rod Can Do
chapters.info: Bela, p. 673 (814)—Siuan's mare. She is short, shaggy, and quite docile. Egwene rode her out of Emond's Field when she left with Moiraine and Lan. Bela actually belongs to Tam al'Thor, and Rand suggested her as a way to take Egwene with them.
